scripts.ja: 日本には四季があります。
scripts.en: We have four distinct seasons in Japan.

scripts.ja: 今、あなたの国の季節は何ですか？
scripts.en: What season is it in your country now?
It's the season for cherry blossoms.

scripts.ja: 花より団子というよね。
scripts.en: Bread is better than the song of a bird.
We've had our first spring storm.

scripts.ja: 花粉症は大丈夫ですか？

scripts.en: The rainy season is so depressing.

scripts.ja: 今年のすいかはおいしいですね。
scripts.en: Watermelons this year are extremely good !

scripts.ja: 夏はやっぱりかき氷に限るね！
scripts.en: I love to eat "kakigori" in the summer !

scripts.ja: 猛暑が続いて熱中症になった。
scripts.en: I got heat stroke because of the terrible heat wave.
What're your plans for the summer holidays?
We are going to have mild winter this year.

scripts.ja: 冬至にはゆず湯に入ろう。
scripts.en: Let's put a few slices of "yuzu" in our hot bath on the winter solstice day.
